definition: first love
at first/(at the) beginning/first/junior/basic
to feel attached to/to long for/to love
feelings of first love

sentences.english: Author mark is very obvious in the description interposing in "first love".
sentences.chinese: 作者在《初恋》中设置的叙述标记非常明显。

sentences.english: Memories of his first love were still enshrined in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 他依然将初恋的回忆珍藏在心的神翕里。

sentences.english: First love is singing about vernal blazing passion, performing our young maturation.
sentences.chinese: 初恋吟唱着青春炽烈的激情，上演着我们青涩的成熟。

sentences.english: Thai Arabica Coffee is my first lover.
sentences.chinese: 泰国咖啡，我的初恋情人。

sentences.english: My first love, I and you have mutual affinity.
sentences.chinese: 我的初恋，我与你心心相印。
还记得你的初恋女友是谁？

sentences.english: Brother got married, my sister-in-law is my first love.
sentences.chinese: 哥哥结婚了，嫂子竟然是我得初恋情人。

sentences.english: I don’t think anybody really gets over his first love.
sentences.chinese: 我认为没有人能够真正忘掉初恋。

sentences.english: My first love was when I was in high school.
sentences.chinese: 我的初恋是在高中的时候。

sentences.english: After all, she was my first lover.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，她是我的初恋情人。

sentences.english: We're highschool sweethearts and he was my first.
sentences.chinese: 我们高中开始就在一起，他是我的初恋。

sentences.english: The first kiss with his girlfriend first love, she whole body tingling .
sentences.chinese: 第一次与初恋女友接吻，她全身发麻。

sentences.english: They prefer to be the woman's first love.
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢当女人的初恋情人。
毫无经验的初恋是迷人的。

sentences.english: There is nothing holier , in this life of ours . than the first consciousness of love.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的生命中，没有什么能比意识到初恋更神圣。

sentences.english: Unexperienced love is charming, while durable-love is priceless.
sentences.chinese: 初恋是迷人的，但是经受住时间的爱情是无价的。

definition: to be secretly in love with
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to fall head over heels in love/to be passionately in love
unrequited love/one-sided love
first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
romance/love (romantic)/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4]
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
lover/sweetheart
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
to love dearly
to be madly in love
pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2

definition: to love each other
to court/to go steady/to be dating
love at first sight (idiom)
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
lit. carved in bones and engraved in the heart (idiom)/fig. etched in one's memory/unforgettable
